snippet.title: Babysitter Bloodbath - PC Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Download: https://puppetcombo.itch.io/babysitter-bloodbath

For 22 years Neokalus Burr has stared at an empty wall in the bowels of Monroe State Mental Hospital. But tonight he's ESCAPED to continue his BLOOD SOAKED murder rampage! It's also your first night babysitting

Take care of young Billy while his parents enjoy a night on the town
Talk to your friends on the phone
Invite a cute guy over to watch scary movies
Be stalked, chased and murdered by the madman from your nightmares
Use your wits and whatever tools and weapons are available
Do whatever it takes to survive the night!

Babysitter Bloodbath is inspired by 70s and 80s slasher flicks. Gameplay wise, it owes more to the PSX era survival horror genre (Resident Evil, Silent Hill, Clock Tower) with some enhancements: 1st person weapon aiming, multiple camera perspectives, and strafing. Babysitter Bloodbath attempts to be realistic portrayal of a psychopath breaking into an isolated house to kill.

Download on itch io: https://puppetcombo.itch.io/babysitter-bloodbath
Website: http://puppetcombo.com
